snippet.title: Links between iron supply, marine productivity, sea surface temperature and CO2 over the last 1.1 Ma
snippet.description: Links between iron supply, marine productivity, sea surface temperature and CO2 over the last 1.1 Ma / Martínez García, Alfredo (Institut de Ciència i Tecnologia Ambientals) ; Rosell Melé, Antoni (Institut de Ciència i Tecnologia Ambientals) ; Geibert, Walter (University of Edinburgh. School of Geosciences) ; Gersonde, Rainer (AlfredWegener Institute for Polar and Marine Research (Alemanya)) ; Masqué Barri, Pere (Institut de Ciència i Tecnologia Ambientals) ; Gaspari, Vania (Institute for the Dynamics of Environmental Processes (Itàlia)) ; Barbante, Carlo (Institute for the Dynamics of Environmental Processes (Itàlia)) Paleoclimatic reconstructions have provided a unique data set to test the sensitivity of climate system to changes in atmospheric CO2 concentrations. However, the mechanisms behind glacial/interglacial (G/IG) variations in atmospheric CO2 concentrations observed in the Antarctic ice cores are still not fully understood. [...] 2009 Paleoceanography, Vol. 24, Issue 1 (March 2009) , p. PA1207
